Co-founders and designers Ohad Seroya and Aviad Klin brilliantly masters the art of sophisticated glamour using signature shimmery lit sequin fabrics and antique lace in seductively draped silhouettes for a coveted collection of elevated party-ready attire.

products.name: One-Shoulder Satin Column Gown

The dress measures approximately 62 inches from shoulder to hem and is made from 100% polyester. Complete with a center back zipper with hook-and-eye closure, this gown is perfect for any special occasion. Dry clean only. Imported.

The center back zipper with hook-and-eye closure ensures a seamless fit, while the 100% polyester fabric is both elegant and easy to care for. Perfect for special occasions, this gown measures approximately 65 inches from shoulder to hem. Make a statement in this imported masterpiece, dry clean only for best results.

products.brandedName: Rene Ruiz Collection Halter Gown
products.description: Elevate your evening attire with the stunning Rene Ruiz Halter Gown. This exquisite gown from the renowned brand Rene Ruiz features a beautiful lavender satin design with a pleated skirt for a feminine and elegant look. The gown measures approximately 64 inches from shoulder to hem, making it the perfect choice for formal events and special occasions. Complete with a center back zipper with hook-and-eye closure, this gown is made from 100% polyester and must be dry cleaned only. Imported for the highest quality, the Rene Ruiz Halter Gown is sure to turn heads at any event.

products.name: Easy Shell
products.brandedName: Vince Easy Shell
products.description: Introducing the Vince Easy Shell blouse, a versatile addition to your wardrobe from the renowned brand Vince. Inspired by the natural beauty of California, Vince is known for its simplicity and laid-back staples. This Easy Shell blouse in optic white is perfect for creating effortlessly chic looks. Made from 100% Pima cotton, this blouse is lightweight and comfortable. With a length of approximately 22 inches from shoulder to hem, this piece is a wardrobe essential. Machine washable and imported, the Vince Easy Shell blouse is easy to care for and perfect for everyday wear. Upgrade your casual cool vibes with this timeless piece from Vince.

products.name: Travel Hyaluronic Body Serum
products.brandedName: Osea Travel Hyaluronic Body Serum
products.description: Travel Hyaluronic Body Serum Travel Hyaluronic Body Serum This ultra-hydrating daily body treatment instantly boosts hydration and improves skin's natural moisture barrier for visibly smooth, toned, luminous skin. Powered by 5 molecular weights of hydrating hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide, vegan peptides, nutrient-rich seaweed and aloe for multi-surface layer hydration that lasts 24 hours. Fragrance-free and oil-free. Made for sensitive skin and dermatologist tested.. Vegan and cruelty-free Free of parabens, phthalates, petroleum, sulfates, and synthetic fragrances. Visibly smooths, tones and delivers 24 hours of non-stop moisture. 5 weights of hyaluronic acid deliver multi-surface layer hydration Use alone or as a prep step to help maximize your skincare results. 1 fl oz. Apply to clean skin, from the neck down.. Use alone or allow product to absorb, then layer on your OSEA body moisturizer (sold separately) of choice to help maximize your skincare results.. Can be applied to dry or damp skin. Use morning and night.. OSER-WU74. HBS-T. Clean, clinically tested skincare from the sea. Founded in 1996 in Malibu, California, OSEA set a new industry standard for clean beauty, creating safe and effective seaweed-infused skincare with a holistic approach to wellness and self-care. Our formulas are powered by a unique blend of pure, potent seaweed and active botanicals for results you can sea. Mother and daughter founded, OSEA is rooted in over 100 years of multigenerational female wisdom and our family?s unwavering belief in the healing power of the sea.

Almond toe Slips on Leather upper Leather lining Leather sole Made in Italy SIZE Kitten heel: about 1.5" (40mm) ABOUT THE BRAND Italian designer Salvatore Ferragamo began his journey in 1927 in Italy with a vision of creating the world's most beautiful shoes. Since its inception, Ferragamo has expanded to include clothing, accessories and beauty under the creative direction of Maximilian Davis-who brings a minimalist-meets-maximalist aesthetic to the brand.
